snippet: South Africa's President Jacob Zuma said on Saturday economic growth in the continent's most advanced economy would be the focus of his second term, as he was inaugurated in the nation's capital, Pretoria....

headline.print_headline: South Africa's Zuma Promises to Boost Economy in Second Term
headline.main: South Africa's Zuma Promises to Boost Economy in Second Term

lead_paragraph: South Africa's President Jacob Zuma said on Saturday economic growth in the continent's most advanced economy would be the focus of his second term, as he was inaugurated in the nation's capital, Pretoria.
